name: Oik Memory 2
summary:
Casual memory puzzle.
At the beginning of each round in a short time the game marks from 4 to 12 blocks. You need to open these blocks in the right order!

50 levels
2000+ Achievements
Relaxing music

此情可待成追忆，只是当时已惘然。
info:

  • 游戏类型: 休闲
